# init(region:)

**Initializer**

Creates a relevance provider for a location specified as a region.

## Declaration

```swift
init(region: CLRegion)
```

## Parameters

- **region**: A region defining the relevant location.

## Return Value

A newly initialized location relevance provider.
title: init(region:)
